subject: DynaMock EasyMock JMock?
msgSnippet: Hi, I apologise for the repeat post, but thought I might get some answers second time around :-) Thanks. I want to unit-test my database application, but am a
messageBody:
Hi,

I apologise for the repeat post, but thought I might get some answers
second time around :-) Thanks.

I want to unit-test my database application, but am a bit confused
after reading Massol's 'JUnit in Action' and Rainsberger's 'JUnit
Recipes'. Granted these books were published in 2004 and 2005
respectively, so may be a bit outdated.

JUnit in Action uses DynaMock for its database testing examples in
Chapter 11. Does DynaMock still exist or is JMock the new version of
it? But JMock doesn't contain any specific SQL classes, like
MockConnection, or?

EasyMock doesn't seem to have any SQL specific classes either.

So what's the latest recommendation of a mock object implementation
when testing database applications?

Thanks,
Deirdre
